channel.title: Client Help! A.S.A.P!
channel.description:
Hey guys, i need help with my client because i can use my server but other people can't :(
[IMG]http://i810.photobucket.com/albums/zz28/jamesduncan1/Moparscapeclientcomplierhelp001.jpg[/img]
Thanks, James.

item.title: Client Help! A.S.A.P!
item.dc:creator: @RealmofTerror RealmofTerror
item.description:
@RealmofTerror wrote:

Did you port forward correctly, using your static ip is correct but you have to make sure you port forwarded correctly. If you find no problem with your port forwarding try checking the ip address you put in while port forwarding and the ip address of the computer you are running the server from. The ip address can change periodically.

For example when you first port forwarded maybe you ip address was 192.168.1.102 but then your ip on your computer changed to 192.168.1.103. That one number can make all the difference.

Read full topic
